skillTree.localised_description: A specially-engineered breed of Rat Ogre, the Bonebreaker has a braced platform strapped or bolted to its back for carrying a Skaven Warlord to battle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: For the gaudier Warlord, Clan Moulder offers their most bloated Pox Rats as mounts to flail, crush, and savage a way through the enemy’s ranks.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This is a unit created by Clan Moulder. Packmasters and Throt the Unclean can push it to its full combat potential and restore it in battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
If you've got the Warptokens and the contacts, you can get all manner of fine, murderous armaments crafted to fit claw or tail perfectly.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It should be no surprise that a race without a shred of honour or decency between them have even less regard for each other's lives.
The best-laid plans – those involving murder with poison and knives – must remain secret, under pain of a hideous death involving poison and knives...

effects.description:
Assassinate action: Additional 8% success chance
	(own characters in region)

Hero action cost: -33%
	(own characters in region)

Hero action cost: -50%
	(own characters in region)

Hero action success chance: +12%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: If you wish to expand into new territory, it helps to head-up a voracious, colonising force that breed like… er, oh!

effects.description:
Income from Settlement buildings: +2%
	(all regions factionwide)

Income from Settlement buildings: +4%
	(all regions factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
As you might expect, the forces of order are repelled by the Skaven and their myriad disgusting, disease-ridden ways.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dwarfs
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Lizardmen
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves, Lizardmen, Dwarfs and men

skillTree.localised_description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: This one is clever-smart. Food-rations preserved and brought along with army to feed the clanrats, yes-yes!
Grab-carry more-more! Take all!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Spot-find their armies, loot-take their supplies!
Skavenslaves must carry supplies, carve out under-caverns, and fight on the frontline. Then, they might be given some food (probably dead skavenslaves).

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Captives make the best meals.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To rise above the rank and file, to claw one's way above the mire and the filth, takes a certain, superior breed of Skaven.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Clanrats units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having to hide, for an extended period, in a dark, dank recess, in order to entrap and kill your target encourages lateral thinking.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +9% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing exactly where and when to strike is essential when fielding fiendish, potentially battle-winning plague-weapons.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Warpfire Thrower, Warplock Jezzails, Ratling Gun, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units

skillTree.localised_description: Is it better to be respected or feared? What sort of question is that... why, both of course!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Stormvermin, Death Runners, Plague Monks and Eshin Triads units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This one has seen the hideous deformities created by Clan Moulder firsthand and now fancies himself a dab hand with a needle and thread…

skillTree.localised_description: This one's intimate knowledge of the inner workings of Skaven machinery enables him to improve their efficiency on the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: The wise commander considers the lash a dear friend - so much more than a motivational tool to encourage correctness in spirit and behaviour.

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Skavenslaves, Clanrats and Stormvermin units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Skavenslaves, Clanrats and Stormvermin units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Early years spent in the gutter both prepares the ambitious rat for power and schools him in the dirtier, more cut-throat ways of war.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Gutter Runners, Night Runners, Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +20% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Gutter Runners and Night Runners units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This one knows just what to say to 'encourage' the very best work from his underling Warp-smiths and technicians.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Weapon Team, Doom-Flayers, Doomwheel, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Weapon Team, Doom-Flayer, Doomwheel, Plagueclaw Catapult and Warp Lightning Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Potions infused with Warpstone transmogrify the not-always-willing testbed subjects; those who survive the process emerge stronger and better in every way.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Wolf Rats, Rat Ogres, Mutant Rat Ogre, Brood Horror, Hell Pit Abomination and Plague Monks units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Keeping on top of things with an iron fist prevents Skavendom from becoming too much of a degenerate mess.
Naturally, rats get in everywhere – even the tiniest opening presents little obstacle – spreading their disease and corruption everywhere they can.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
When making corpses of your foes, leave nothing of value for their kin to recover.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
By their very nature, rats are very sneaky - even sneakier than Goblins. In fact, they're probably the sneakiest of all.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (fear and terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ugly? Yes. But tasty!
Not really.
Slaves listen but none else.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Skavenslaves units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ugh, scary but efficent.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Hell Pit Abomination units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Rat Ogres units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Shiny Things!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +50%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Yes! Shoot them from afar!

effects.description:
Upkeep: +10% for Warpfire Thrower, Ratling Gun, Warplock Jezzails, Poisoned Wind Globadiers, Poisoned Wind Mortars and Death Globe Bombardiers units
	(all units in army)

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: To run-flee!
Slow but good to get some nasty hits.
